private: 👋🏻 Hi there! 💭 Groups Guard is the most complete bot to help you manage your Groups easily and safely. ❓ Just press the 📚 Commands button below to see all the commands of the bot or hit /help
group:
Hello, i'm Guards Bot!

To discover my functions, please start a conversation with me.
info_page: • Groups Guard Bot 🔖 Bot version: {version} ({version_code}) 🧑🏼‍💻 Developer: @alpha_romeo_06 Groups Guard is a bot developed in Python3 and using Pyrogram as the framework with sql as the database. 🆕 Visit @HowToCloneourbot to get know how to make your own clone of Guard Bot.
support_info_text:
• The Bot support information.

We have an official Group & Channel for this bot support. You can ask for help/support of this bot there, and then the group staff will guide you with your problem.

💬 Chat: @GroupsGuardSupport
📣 News: @Teakadai_tamilchat

To get direct support you can contact the admin of this bot:

» 👮🏻 @alpha_romeo_06
» 👮🏻 @GroupsGuardSupport

⚠️ The bot staff cannot assist you in situations involving groups using this bot.
